meanings.definition: To separate into individual parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: She ungroups the puzzle pieces to put them together.
meanings.sent2: The teacher ungroups the students for a group activity.
meanings.sent3: He ungroups the colors of the rainbow to create a new pattern.
meanings.sent4: The artist ungroups the shapes to form a unique composition.
meanings.sent5: The chef ungroups the ingredients before starting to cook.

meanings.definition: To remove from a group or category.
meanings.sent1: He ungroups the red apples from the green ones.
meanings.sent2: The librarian ungroups the books by genre for easier access.
meanings.sent3: She ungroups the animals based on their habitats.
meanings.sent4: The organizer ungroups the items to declutter the space.
meanings.sent5: The gardener ungroups the plants to rearrange the garden layout.
